data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=EKbtoh0CJ9UQ7kNvgHmxGjP&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCi0Uqia5Q-rJPAdYubL-Lgn6K7cfxGEHkntFGZV9zMUA&oe=66449AB7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=o0pfG43KH5wQ7kNvgFtuv6f&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCkl4Z2K6c1vUX0BO4-v2dXmQbf-dWGVdp5jc2EmIDQlQ&oe=6644A852)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982555_716104293832637_6157177355803125122_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2uOi117OgLwQ7kNvgFuejA-&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAmcGi8e1mxO3xNs9NknZISt2ZmqJVv53vbOQjeFeZhnw&oe=6644ABD0)
